reviews.review_text: I've taken 6 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had doubled my rates. The community support was incredible too.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The evidence base section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my undergraduate studies. Now I can confidently explain trauma-informed practice to clients and colleagues.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 11 hours of work. Closed 5 new clients in 2 months using the pitch framework from Module 5. Already made back 2x my investment.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 3 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the client journey map from Module 5. Now charging $200 per session vs $97 before. Game changer.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on insurance billing. The Module 5 module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.

I've taken 13 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

As someone with a background in nursing, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of cognitive-behavioral and acceptance-commitment approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the marketing scripts templates alone saved me 37 hours of work. Closed 7 new clients in 2 months using the pitch framework from Module 3. Already made back 3x my investment.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The progress tracker was excellent, but cultural considerations could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

Decent course. The the assessment section module was fantastic, but Module 6 didn't deliver as much value. The workbook could be more detailed. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

Decent course. The Module 2 module was fantastic, but the marketing section didn't deliver as much value. Some videos felt too long. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

I've taken 11 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 2 months I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the niche positioning and saw 58% revenue increase in 3 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 9 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

I've taken 7 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had built a waitlist. The community support was incredible too.

I've taken 13 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had filled my calendar. The community support was incredible too.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 1 month after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the pricing framework from Module 1. Now charging $155 per session vs $51 before. Game changer.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by academic sources, which builds massive credibility with clients. The outcome assessment has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the marketing scripts templates alone saved me 32 hours of work. Closed 13 new clients in 90 days using the pitch framework from Module 5. Already made back 2x my investment.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the consultation model from Module 5. Now charging $330 per session vs $67 before. Game changer.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 10 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

The practice exercises made all the difference. I learn best by discussion, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The video demonstrations helped me finally understand motivational interviewing.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on marketing strategies. The the assessment section module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the client journey map from Module 6. Now charging $325 per session vs $88 before. Game changer.
